title: Sambar
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) toor dal (yellow lentils)', '450ml (16 fl oz) water', '100g (4 oz) tamarind pulp', '100ml (4 fl oz) water', '1 green pepper, sliced', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon channa dal', '1 tablespoon desiccated coconut', '2 dried red chillies', '1 dessertspoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seed', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '1/4 teaspoon asafoetida']
